name: Confederation of Passenger Transport (UK)
membership:
International Road Transport Union (IRU)
International Public Transport Union (UITP)
goal:
An environment in which the UK bus and coach industries can profitably meet the needs of passengers while improving the environment and limiting congestion.

We represent the licence-holding operators of local bus services, regular long-distance coaches, coaches for hire and tourist coaches.
euInitiatives: Road transport, including social dossiers.  Market organisation.  VAT.  Sustainable tourism.  Brexit.
